TopicTitle: A request for Infernal robotics mod for 0.22

Articles.Content:
Somebody please post me a link for Infernal Robotics mod for KSP 0.22

Please don't give me links with ad.fly.It dosent work on PC which I am using to post this.

Please help me !!

This was the second hit when I searched the Infernal Robotics thread for "0.22". [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/37707-0-90-Magic-Smoke-Industries-Infernal-Robotics-0-19-3?p=862172&highlight=0.22#post862172](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/37707-0-90-Magic-Smoke-Industries-Infernal-Robotics-0-19-3?p=862172&highlight=0.22#post862172)
Thank you so much ! I owe you !
